name: The Word Stack
description:
Team

GROUP 5: Xie, Yichen Chen, Yuanrui Sateesh, Tejas

Controls:

Press 1, 2, 3, 4 to move the top letter from a column to another column

There are three words in the stack, but the order is disturbed. You need to move the letters so that we have three words in three stacks.
